title: Create meeting minutes from recorded discussion from a scratch, do not use template
description: Creating professional meeting minutes for Product Strategy Planning Session from scratch

conversation.content:
Create meeting minutes from recorded discussion from a scratch, do not use template. Meeting: Product Strategy Planning Session
Date: October 22, 2024
Attendees: Sarah Chen (CEO), Mike Johnson (CTO), Lisa Park (CPO), Tom Wilson (CFO)
Duration: 2 hours
Key Decisions:
- Approved $2M budget for AI feature development
- Q1 2025 product roadmap finalized
- New pricing strategy for enterprise tier
Action Items:
- Mike to hire 3 ML engineers by November
- Lisa to conduct user research on proposed features
- Tom to prepare financial projections for board meeting
Follow-up: Weekly sync meetings starting next Monday
I'll help you create professional meeting minutes from scratch in Word. Let me first check the Word connection status and then create a well-formatted document with your meeting information.

actions.title: Check Word Connection

conversation.content: Great! Word is connected. Now I'll create professional meeting minutes with proper formatting and structure.

actions.title: Insert HTML Content

conversation.content: Perfect! The meeting minutes document is complete. Let me export it:

Document successfully exported! I've created professional meeting minutes for your Product Strategy Planning Session. The document includes:

Key Features:

1. Professional Header - Clear title with meeting name and date
2. Meeting Details Section - Organized information about date, duration, and type
3. Attendees Table - Clean presentation of all participants with their roles
4. Key Decisions - Three major decisions with checkmarks and detailed descriptions
5. Action Items Table - Structured table showing owner, action, and due dates
6. Follow-up Box - Highlighted section for the weekly sync meetings
7. Notes Section - Additional context about the meeting outcomes
8. Professional Footer - Document preparation date and distribution list

Design Elements:

- Clean, professional formatting with consistent color scheme (blue headers)
- Visual indicators (checkmarks for decisions, arrows for actions)
- Proper spacing and hierarchy for easy reading
- Table format for action items with clear ownership and deadlines
- Highlighted follow-up section to ensure visibility

document.title: Meeting Minutes - Product Strategy Planning Session
document.subtitle: October 22, 2024
